posts.post_content:
I recently upgraded these two cards; the McGraw in this back is readily available, but I did have problems finding the Baker.

Asking [strike]$40 for the McGraw (SOLD) and[/strike] $55 for the Baker.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/27773/baker-home-run[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/18996/mcgraw-john-glove-at-hip[/IMG]
